title: Arizona State University
Academic affiliation: URA: Universities Research Association , APLU: Association of Public and Land-grant Universities , ABOR: Arizona Board of Regents , PLuS Alliance , University Innovation Alliance
Students: 51,869 Tempe campus , 11,737 Downtown Phoenix campus , 4,809 Polytechnic campus , 4,063 West campus , 327 Thunderbird School, 30,000 online
Campus: Urban , Tempe: 661.6 acres (2.677 km 2 ) , Polytechnic: 574.55 acres (2.3251 km 2 ) , West: 277.92 acres (1.1247 km 2 ) , Downtown Phoenix: 17.97 acres (0.0727 km 2 )
Sporting affiliations: NCAA Division I FBS - Pac-12, MPSF: Mountain Pacific Sports Federation
